amendment.description: To address the applicability and preservation of certain State authorities, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4071 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 80 - 18. Record Vote Number: 155.

action.text: Amendment SA 4071 proposed by Senator Carper to Amendment SA 3739. (consideration: CR S3868-3872, S3872-3873) To address the applicability and preservation of certain State authorities, and for other purposes.
